title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 648 - Mortgages For Indefinite Amounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 648 - Mortgages For Indefinite Amounts

State Regulations
§ 648.1 - Mortgages for indefinite amounts
§ 648.2 - Procedure to follow when recording a mortgage for an indefinite amount
§ 648.3 - Payment of tax after mortgage for an indefinite amount is recorded

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 648

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
